Package edu.utsa.cs4953.abacus

Class Summary
BeadBlock A group of beads.
Board A logical model of the board of an abacus.
DrawingPanel A panel for drawing stuff.
FivesBlock Represents a single row of beads in the five's column.
HitBox Represents a clickable area on the board.
MayaNumeralPanel A column of Mayan digits representing the value of the board.
MenuHandler Event handler for clicking a button.
OnesBlock Represents a row on beads in the one's column.
Program The application's main window.
Row Represents a single row of bead in the abacus.
Settings A place holder for data that's better off being global.
SettingsPane Lets the user change the program settings.
StatusPanel  
Theme Loads and organizes the myriad graphics assets of bead states and backgrounds.
ThemeHandler Handles events from the theme combo box.
Trivia Displays bits of educational trivia.
 

Enum Summary
Board.Base Determines the numeric base of the board.
Mode Determines whether the board is in split-board mode or normal mode.
SoundEffect The collection of all sound effects.
